entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -8.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
